channel.title: web on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in web on Barefoot Rob

item.title: https on mt3.robnugen.com
item.description: 09:47 Wednesday 09 August 2017 JST I added a Let’s Encrypt certificate to allow https://mt3.robnugen.com to refresh to the latest Marble Track 3 entries.

item.title: Coding like back in the day
item.description: 11:41 Wednesday 02 December 2015 JST I cannot currently load https://ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/jquery/1.7.2/jquery.min.js because this “free” wifi I’m on disallows https, so I can’t run my page, so… oh wait I don’t need jquery to work on a different thing, so I can work on that thing instead. I was thinking it was like coding without compiling, so it reminded me of stories where programmers had to check their code N times before sending it off to be run on the mainframe, and any error would mean losing a day of work.

item.title: Helped JB website
item.description: ##15:01 Wednesday 07 January 2015 JST## * c97bf3b (HEAD, master) 'Fixed' links to three blog entries (news items) * 20ce7d0 Fixed headers on four pages to include links to お問い合わせ * 0ae1cfc Fixed links to news items in top page (not sidebar) * 14d2579 gave access to new IP address at JB school Those are from today. yay! K and T were very happy!
